description: Enables audit logging for deployment freeze bypass actions.
Provides granular role-based access control for deployment freeze operations based on environment type.
Enables GitLab tag event triggers for pipelines.
Enables Terraform policy evaluation in Continuous Delivery workflows.
Provides textarea input for override variables in deployment configurations.
Optimizes Tanzu Application Service (TAS) login performance and reliability by reducing the number of CLI initialisation calls.
Adds support for Terraform Cloud plan refresh type operations.
Enables configuration to block certain users from approving in Harness Approval steps based on emails.
Enables OIDC authentication for Azure connectors.
Fixes authentication issues when listing Google Cloud Platform projects.
Enables cross-project access for Google Cloud Platform connectors.
Enables optional values.yaml files in K8s & Helm deployments.
Enforces Git-based experience for CD entities such as service, environment, infrastructure and override configurations.
Provides detailed logging for Kubernetes operations in CD.
Enforces certain validation for infrastructure definitions in CD.
Internal optimisation to use secondary database nodes for TimescaleDB queries to improve performance.
Fixes a bug that resolves expressions in overrides at the service step.
Enables Git experience for service and infrastructure overrides management.
Enables Event Relay triggers for pipelines.
Implements failure strategies for service and infrastructure deployment steps.
Adds identifier support for version 2 service and infrastructure overrides.
Fixes rollback functionality in SSH and WinRM deployments.
Enables steady state checks on retries for ECS deployments.
Fixes the order of lifecycle hooks in Auto Scaling Group deployments.
Adds rollback support for multi-deployment Auto Scaling Group deployments.
Enables canary deployment strategy for AWS Lambda functions.
Enables detection of orphaned instances in deployments & cleans them up.
Improves slot name extraction for Azure Functions using function names.
Fixes a bug by preventing double version publishing in AWS Lambda deployments.
Provides a refresh button to manually refresh the status of the approval ticket in Jira and ServiceNow approval steps.
Disables environment API updates for service overrides on overrides V2.
Masks secrets in Kubernetes deployment wrap-up logs for security.
Adds validation for manifest types in service overrides version 1.0.
Enables traffic shifting for Spot deployments.
Refreshes execution authentication tokens for EKS clusters.
Validates that namespace overrides match with infrastructure namespace configurations.
Improves service dashboard load time by optimizing API calls and relocating certain data to enhance performance.
Adds ECS tag support for AWS Lambda deployments.
Enables traffic shifting capabilities for ECS deployments.
Enables mounting ConfigMaps and Secrets as volumes in container step groups.
Adds support for traffic route rewrite rules in Kubernetes deployments.
Enables Open Policy Agent evaluation on runtime context for services.
Fixes a rare bug in how service overrides were merged.
Enables monitoring of task status in ECS deployments.
Fixes a bug where scope of the infrastructure was not being honored to enforce RBAC.
Enables blue-green deployment validation with same target groups in ECS.
Enables traffic shifting without creating temporary versions.
Enables Open Policy Agent governance for CD entities such as service, environment, infrastructure and overrides.
Enables the use of selectors in asynchronous executable operations.
Enables creating environments groups containing environments from different scopes.
Enables service and environment dashboard at account and organization levels for better visibility.
Fixes a bug where the Delegate selector precedence was not being honored for container step groups.
Fixes a bug where run-as-user and privileged mode settings were not being honored for container step groups.
Implements API pagination for the service dashboard user interface for better performance.
Always resets perpetual tasks post deployments ensuring the recent connector details are used.
Enables the new project overview dashboard interface for better visibility.
Implements failure strategies for initialization steps.
Allows users to configure how the Pipeline should handle failures during multi-service/multi-environment/multi-infrastructure deployments.
Enables specification of infrastructure configurations in deployments.
Enables shell script execution host capability checks.
Enables WinRM configuration file copying with proper encoding support.
Allows skipping infrastructure validation during deployments.
Uses Kubernetes API for steady state checks instead of kubectl.
Allows user type fields in Jira integration configurations.
Enables a new landing overview page interface for better visibility and performance.
Enables Next Generation Kubernetes service release naming.
Enables multiple source configurations for GitOps Applications.
Add the functionality to run Helm chart tests.
Add attribute connectorUrl as a manifest output from service step.
Delete instance records in all cases when we are deleting the instance sync perpetual tasks related records.
Adds Audit Trail for GitOps related actions.
Use oc client when in Wrap Up and rollback when Kubernetes manifest contains Openshift resources
Adds option in Override menu to view override yaml without expanding the specific override.
Ensures pod rollout on ConfigMap/Secret changes when Declarative Rollback is enabled.
Support K8s delegate virtual service during Blue/Green deployment
Track release name usage across services and warn during execution if same release name is used by a different service or environment for current workload
Approval notifications can now include details about the service, environment, and infrastructure used in the CD stages.
Ensures sensitive information is kept safe when pulling container images.
Enable GitOps operator configuration.
Improve handling of istio traffic routing resources for Kuberentes canary deployments
Fixes rollback failures by ensuring correct branch reference is used when retrieving YAML files during post-deployment rollbacks.
Added a filter to exclude inactive or failed Lambda functions from being counted as instances.
It allows to clone the environment across scopes.
Include environment and service information in stage notifications
Enable the [Notifications management](https://developer.harness.io/docs/platform/notifications/centralised-notification/) feature at all scopes
